channel.description: Local File Systems and Swap \ \ This chapter describes the following major topics: \ Understand file systems and their benefits, categories, and types \ Review file system types: Ext3/Ext4, XFS, VFAT, and ISO9660 \ Know file system administration commandset \ Mount and unmount file systems manually and persistently \ Determine and use UUID \ Apply and use file system label \ Monitor file system and directory usage \ Create and mount different types of local file systems in partitions
